description: Participants prepare for performance of a one-act opera or opera scenes. Students receive coaching and performance experience through individual and group singing/acting exercises. The course culminates with staged and costumed public performances. Open to all students. May be repeated once. A class fee may be required. Offered periodically during January term. Prerequisites: two semesters of voice study or permission of instructor.
name: Opera Workshop
notes: This course includes an academic civic engagement (ACE) component.
prerequisites: Prerequisites: two semesters of voice study or permission of instructor.
